title: "Henry Kissinger Says AI Is 'as Consequential' but 'Less Predictable' Than Nuclear Weapons"
excerpt: "\"AI isn't novel because it's trying to take over the world (it isn't); it's novel because it's imprecise, dynamic, emergent and capable of learning all at the same time.\" Eric Schmidt, Hernry Kissinger and Daniel Huttenlocher talk about their new book and the promises and perils of AI."
